page.title: 03A meat-packers, Fraserburgh
page.content: If you take a walk,or a drive along Harbour Road you will see to your left a company of which my father is the Assistant Production Manager.It is a meat company called 'Swifts' because of the founders surname.Their marginal profits are low at the moment but I have been told they will improve in the near future. From one of the offices in the building you can see all the commotion of the workers whose job it is to cut, pack,store and put the meat in the several chillers,which keep the meat fresh until use.There is a company which recently took over 'Swifts', it is a multinational corporation which has many diverse interests. Rodger Wilken (14)
